code: import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{persistStore,FLUSH,REHYDRATE,PAUSE,PERSIST,PURGE,REGISTER}from"redux-persist";import rootReducer from"./root-reducer";export var store=configureStore({reducer:rootReducer,middleware:function middleware(getDefaultMiddleware){return getDefaultMiddleware({serializableCheck:{ignoredActions:[FLUSH,REHYDRATE,PAUSE,PERSIST,PURGE,REGISTER]}});}});export var persistor=persistStore(store);
